room_title: Escape room "Inventor's Basement" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Sarasota
review: This is the best thing I have ever done in my life, I may have not completed it, but it was SUPER fun, so worth it.

room_title: Escape room "Inventor's Basement" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Sarasota
review: We’ve tried three different adventures at Escape Rooms Unlocked and have had a blast each time. The hosts are unfailingly welcoming and professional, and the challenges are clever and entertaining. We’ll be trying every room they have to offer!

room_title: Escape room "Inventor's Basement" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Sarasota
review: Thanks to Lisa for a fantastic time. New to Escape Rooms (I'd done one but none of the other three had) - this one was challenging and so fun.

room_title: Escape room "Inventor's Basement" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Sarasota
review: Visited for my best friends birthday and we had a fabulous time. The three of us used our different skills and and escaped with time to spare! Was a lot of fun! Looking forward to trying a different room.
